original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī bhaṇḍanakārikā hoti kalahakārikā vivādakārikā bhassakārikā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārikā.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī bhaṇḍana kārikā hoti kalaha kārikā vivāda kārikā bhassa kārikā saṅghe adhikaraṇa kārikā

original: Thullanandā bhikkhunī tassā kamme karīyamāne paṭikkosati.
analyzed: thullanandā bhikkhunī tassā kamme karīyamāne paṭikkosati

original: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī gāmakaṁ agamāsi kenacideva karaṇīyena.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī gāmakam agamāsi kenacid eva karaṇīyena

original: “thullanandā bhikkhunī pakkantā”ti, caṇḍakāḷiṁ bhikkhuniṁ āpattiyā adassane ukkhipi.
analyzed: thullanandā bhikkhunī pakkantā ati caṇḍakāḷim bhikkhunim āpattiyāḥ adassane ukkhipi

original: Thullanandā bhikkhunī gāmake taṁ karaṇīyaṁ tīretvā punadeva sāvatthiṁ paccāgacchi.
analyzed: thullanandā bhikkhunī gāmake tam karaṇīyam tīretvā punadeva sāvatthim paccāgacchi

original: Caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā āgacchantiyā neva āsanaṁ paññapesi
analyzed: caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā āgacchantiyā na eva āsanam paññapesi

original: na pādodakaṁ pādapīṭhaṁ pādakaṭhalikaṁ upanikkhipi na paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṁ paṭiggahesi
analyzed: na pāda udakam pāda pīṭham pāda kaṭhalikam upanikkhipi na paccuggantvā patta cīvaram paṭiggahesi
thullanandā bhikkhunī caṇḍakāḷim bhikkhunim etat avoca

original: “kissa tvaṁ, ayye, mayi āgacchantiyā neva āsanaṁ paññapesi na pādodakaṁ pādapīṭhaṁ pādakaṭhalikaṁ upanikkhipi na paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṁ paṭiggahesi na pānīyena āpucchī”ti?
analyzed: kissa tva ayye mayi āgacchantiyā na iva āsanam paññapesi na pāda udakam pāda pīṭham pāda kaṭhalikam upanikkhipi na paccuggantvā patta cīvaram paṭiggahesi na pānīyena āpucchi iti
evam ha ita ayye yathā tam anāthāya ati
kissa pana tva ayye anātha ati

original: ‘ayaṁ anāthā appaññātā, natthi imissā kāci paṭivattā’ti, āpattiyā adassane ukkhipiṁsū”ti.
analyzed: ayam anāthā appaññātā natthi imissā kāci paṭivattā ati āpattiyāḥ adassane ukkhipisu uti

original: “bālā etā abyattā etā, neva jānanti kammaṁ vā kammadosaṁ vā kammavipattiṁ vā kammasampattiṁ vā.
analyzed: bālāḥ etāḥ abyattāḥ etāḥ na iva jānanti kammam vā kamma dosam vā kamma vipattim vā kamma sampattim vā

original: Mayaṁ kho jānāma kammampi kammadosampi kammavipattimpi kammasampattimpi.
analyzed: mayam kho jānāma kammam pi kamma dosam pi kamma vipattim pi kamma sampattim pi

original: Mayaṁ kho akataṁ vā kammaṁ kāreyyāma kataṁ vā kammaṁ kopeyyāmā”ti, lahuṁ lahuṁ bhikkhunisaṅghaṁ sannipātetvā caṇḍakāḷiṁ bhikkhuniṁ osāresi.
analyzed: mayam kho akatam vā kammam kāreyyāma katam vā kammam kopeyyāma ati lahum lahum bhikkhuni saṅgham sannipātetvā caṇḍakāḷim bhikkhunim osāresi

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ bhikkhuniṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṁ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṁ osāressatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma ayyā thullanandā samaggena saṅghena ukkhittam bhikkhunim dhammena vinayena satthu sāsanena an apaloketvā kāraka saṅgham an aññāya gaṇassa chandam osāressati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ bhikkhuniṁ
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittam bhikkhuni

original: dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṁ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṁ osāretī”ti?
analyzed: dhammena vinayena satthu sāsanena an apaloketvā kāraka saṅgham an aññāya gaṇassa chandam osāreti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ bhikkhuniṁ
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittam bhikkhuni

original: dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṁ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṁ osāressati.
analyzed: dhammena vinayena satthu sāsanena an apaloketvā kāraka saṅgham an aññāya gaṇassa chandam osāressati
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ bhikkhuniṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittam bhikkhunim dhammena vinayena satthu sāsanena

original: anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṁ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṁ osāreyya, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṁ
analyzed: an apaloketvā kāraka saṅgham an aññāya gaṇassa chandam osāreyya ayam pi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattika
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti
samāna sa vāsakaḥ samāna sīmāyam ṭhitaḥ

original: āpattiyā adassane vā appaṭikamme vā appaṭinissagge vā ukkhittā.
analyzed: āpattiyāḥ a dassane vā appaṭikamme vā appaṭinissagge vā ukkhittā

original: “Osāressāmī”ti gaṇaṁ vā pariyesati, sīmaṁ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: osāressāmi iti gaṇam vā pariyesati sīmam vā sammannati āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā, kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
analyzed: ñattiyā dukkaṭa dvīhi kamma vācāhi thullaccayā kamma vācā pariyosāne āpatti saṅgha ādisesassa
pe tena api vuccati saṅgha ādiseso ti
dhamma kamme dhamma kamma saññā osāreti āpatti saṅgha ādisesassa
dhamma kamme vematikā osāreti āpatti saṅgha ādisesassa
dhamma kamme adhamma kamma saññā osāreti āpatti saṅgha ādisesassa
adhamma kamme dhamma kamma saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa
adhamma kamme adhamma kamma saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa
